title: HORSCH Live 2021 - Biological Control of Pests and Diseases in the Grupo Progresso

tasks.task: Explain the process and benefits of biological plant protection in large-scale farming.
subtasks: Provide background on Horsch Live and its international virtual seminar.
Introduce Gregory Sanders from Grupo Progresso and his role in the company's agricultural operations.
Outline the history and current state of biological control in Brazilian agriculture.
Describe Grupo Progresso's integrated plant protection system using biological agents.
Detail the company's bioreactor setup and production process for bioagents.
Discuss cost savings from transitioning to biological control agents.
Share insights on future plans for expanding biological agent usage and new technologies.
Address questions from the audience regarding farm operations, resource allocation, and product mapping.
